Posts.Content: pattsssy wrote: This report I received and now have been set for mammogram and ultrasound.  I am obsessing about what it could be.  My husband recently left me and my kids all grown up.  So sitting by myself and thinking the worst is driving me crazy.  Anyone have anything like this. What does 4 mm nodule posteriorly and medially in the left TRAM flap reconstruction, it may be summation of parenchyma artifact, nevertheless, further evaluation with additonal mammographic views and ultrasound.  I have appt. in a week and I am very anxious.  Not sure what all this means.  I have been cancer free for 9 years.  It doesn't describe what nodule looks like.  Where is the location of the nodule.  On chest and middle? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Call back mammo &ultrasound - terrified pattsssy GrandmaV
